description: In this week's installment of embarrassing NSA leaks: European leaders are not happy and the Obama administration is scrambling. There's news of the NSA sucking up information on 60 million phone calls in Spain and there's the awkward question about whether President Obama knew about the agency spying on German Chancellor Angela Merkel's cell phone. But what about our online devices? Oh, you mean you didn’t know October was Cyber Security Awareness Month?
title: Marketplace Tech for Tuesday, October 29, 2013
teaser: In this week's installment of embarrassing NSA leaks: European leaders are not happy and the Obama administration is scrambling. But what about our online devices? Oh, you mean you didn’t know October was Cyber Security Awareness Month?
